items.title: Getting started
items.summary:
Installation

$ yarn add rescript-pages @emotion/css @rescript/react rescript-asyncdata

Add them to your bsconfig.json dependencies:

 "bs-dependencies": [
+  "rescript-pages",
+  "@rescript/react",
+  "rescript-asyncdata

items.title: Consuming content
items.summary:

Items

Pages.useItem("collection", ~id="itemId")

type item = {
  slug: string,
  filename: string,
  title: string,
